<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Comparator &amp;Comp) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  RandomAccessIterator Mid = Start + (std::distance(Start, End) / 2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Comp(&#42;Start, &#42;(End - 1))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">             ? (Comp(&#42;Mid, &#42;(End - 1)) ? (Comp(&#42;Start, &#42;Mid) ? Mid : Start)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       : End - 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">             : (Comp(&#42;Mid, &#42;Start) ? (Comp(&#42;(End - 1), &#42;Mid) ? Mid : End - 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   : Start);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RandomAccessIterator, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Comparator&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> parallel&#95;quick&#95;sort(RandomAccessIterator Start, RandomAccessIterator End,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Comparator &amp;Comp, TaskGroup &amp;TG, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do a sequential sort for small inputs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::distance(Start, End) &lt; detail::MinParallelSize || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a> == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a74cdbd1e4f731e7d7cd83461b8b1de0b">llvm::sort</a>(Start, End, Comp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Partition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pivot = medianOf3(Start, End, Comp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Move Pivot to End.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(&#42;(End - 1), &#42;Pivot);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Pivot = std::partition(Start, End - 1, &#91;&amp;Comp, End&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">decltype</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(&#42;Start) V) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Comp(V, &#42;(End - 1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Move Pivot to middle of partition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(&#42;Pivot, &#42;(End - 1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Recurse.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TG.spawn(&#91;=, &amp;Comp, &amp;TG&#93; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    parallel&#95;quick&#95;sort(Start, Pivot, Comp, TG, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a> - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  parallel&#95;quick&#95;sort(Pivot + 1, End, Comp, TG, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a> - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RandomAccessIterator, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Comparator&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> parallel&#95;sort(RandomAccessIterator Start, RandomAccessIterator End,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Comparator &amp;Comp) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TaskGroup TG;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  parallel&#95;quick&#95;sort(Start, End, Comp, TG,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4f42ed6fd2569fa43f03814a17f9d94a">llvm::Log2&#95;64</a>(std::distance(Start, End)) + 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TaskGroup has a relatively high overhead, so we want to reduce</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the number of spawn() calls. We&#39;ll create up to 1024 tasks here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (Note that 1024 is an arbitrary number. This code probably needs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// improving to take the number of available cores into account.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123; MaxTasksPerGroup = 1024 &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">IterTy, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">ResultTy, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">ReduceFuncTy,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">TransformFuncTy&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">ResultTy parallel&#95;transform&#95;reduce(IterTy Begin, IterTy End, ResultTy Init,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   ReduceFuncTy Reduce,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   TransformFuncTy Transform) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Limit the number of tasks to MaxTasksPerGroup to limit job scheduling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// overhead on large inputs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumInputs = std::distance(Begin, End);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumInputs == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::move(Init);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumTasks = std::min(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(MaxTasksPerGroup), NumInputs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;ResultTy&gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/aliasanalysis-cpp/#a7e344cff0feadf0b02223fee63cc7475">Results</a>(NumTasks, Init);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Each task processes either TaskSize or TaskSize+1 inputs. Any inputs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// remaining after dividing them equally amongst tasks are distributed as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// one extra input over the first tasks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">    TaskGroup TG;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TaskSize = NumInputs / NumTasks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RemainingInputs = NumInputs % NumTasks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">    IterTy TBegin = Begin;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TaskId = 0; TaskId &lt; NumTasks; ++TaskId) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">      IterTy TEnd = TBegin + TaskSize + (TaskId &lt; RemainingInputs ? 1 : 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TG.spawn(&#91;=, &amp;Transform, &amp;Reduce, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/aliasanalysis-cpp/#a7e344cff0feadf0b02223fee63cc7475">Results</a>&#93; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reduce the result of transformation eagerly within each task.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ResultTy <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a> = Init;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IterTy It = TBegin; It != TEnd; ++It)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">          R = Reduce(R, Transform(&#42;It));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/aliasanalysis-cpp/#a7e344cff0feadf0b02223fee63cc7475">Results</a>&#91;TaskId&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TBegin = TEnd;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(TBegin == End);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do a final reduction. There are at most 1024 tasks, so this only adds</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// constant single-threaded overhead for large inputs. Hopefully most</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reductions are cheaper than the transformation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ResultTy FinalResult = std::move(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/aliasanalysis-cpp/#a7e344cff0feadf0b02223fee63cc7475">Results</a>.front());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ResultTy &amp;PartialResult :</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">       <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a99416758c13252bef45320a6ba6aa09c">MutableArrayRef</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/aliasanalysis-cpp/#a7e344cff0feadf0b02223fee63cc7475">Results</a>.data() + 1, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/aliasanalysis-cpp/#a7e344cff0feadf0b02223fee63cc7475">Results</a>.size() - 1))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FinalResult = Reduce(FinalResult, std::move(PartialResult));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::move(FinalResult);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace detail</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace parallel</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">RandomAccessIterator,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">Comparator = std::less&lt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::iterator&#95;traits&lt;RandomAccessIterator&gt;::value&#95;type&gt;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a656bf8371e619956b2d9e5f58b2f538e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a656bf8371e619956b2d9e5f58b2f538e">parallelSort</a>(RandomAccessIterator Start, RandomAccessIterator End,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Comparator &amp;Comp = Comparator()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;THREADS</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/parallel/#a68f04a4e2c26fa6b9cd7517dced50729">parallel::strategy</a>.ThreadsRequested != 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">    parallel::detail::parallel&#95;sort(Start, End, Comp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a74cdbd1e4f731e7d7cd83461b8b1de0b">llvm::sort</a>(Start, End, Comp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aca37fe9da8af401451f8bb3c8241f83d">parallelFor</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Begin, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> End, function&#95;ref&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)&gt; Fn);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IterTy, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FuncTy&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae1d81feea56661c4d5cfa58bcc1f4347"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae1d81feea56661c4d5cfa58bcc1f4347">parallelForEach</a>(IterTy Begin, IterTy End, FuncTy Fn) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aca37fe9da8af401451f8bb3c8241f83d">parallelFor</a>(0, End - Begin, &#91;&amp;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123; Fn(Begin&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;); &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">IterTy, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">ResultTy, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">ReduceFuncTy,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">TransformFuncTy&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad7c6335c3fb4cf669c835f7b97afb3d5"><span class="doxyHighlight">ResultTy <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad7c6335c3fb4cf669c835f7b97afb3d5">parallelTransformReduce</a>(IterTy Begin, IterTy End, ResultTy <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/init">Init</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 ReduceFuncTy Reduce,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 TransformFuncTy Transform) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;THREADS</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/parallel/#a68f04a4e2c26fa6b9cd7517dced50729">parallel::strategy</a>.ThreadsRequested != 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The transform&#95;reduce algorithm requires that the initial value be copyable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Error objects are uncopyable. We only need to copy initial success values,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so work around this mismatch via the C API. The C API represents success</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// values with a null pointer. The joinErrors discards null values and joins</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// multiple errors into an ErrorList.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa3d613e3ad429bdb5b1a7d22796028e9">unwrap</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad7c6335c3fb4cf669c835f7b97afb3d5">parallelTransformReduce</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#91;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcerror/#gad81d81a316ef38888533a24b786a6605">LLVMErrorRef</a> Lhs, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcerror/#gad81d81a316ef38888533a24b786a6605">LLVMErrorRef</a> Rhs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
